thread.title: Tennessee Congressman May Have Misused Campaign Funds, House Ethics Panel Says

author: Natalie Andrews
title: Tennessee Congressman May Have Misused Campaign Funds, House Ethics Panel Says
text:
WASHINGTON—The House Ethics Committee is probing whether Tennessee GOP Rep. John J. Duncan Jr. improperly used tens of thousands of campaign dollars on personal expenses, including on travel for family and bridal showers for his wife’s friends.
The panel on Wednesday released a 57-page report by the Office of Congressional Ethics, which looked through 10 years of campaign expenditures and concluded last December that there was “substantial reason” to believe that Mr. Duncan’s campaign committee and leadership PAC spent funds...
